DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant College Sport Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity._An institution of higher education created to educate and grant degrees; often a part of a university._An active diversion requiring physical exertion and competition._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An institution of higher education created to educate and grant degrees; often a part of a university.
An active diversion requiring physical exertion and competition.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
